verbs.description: Melania Trump [V: has] successfully planned yet another White House Easter Egg Roll . This year she incorporated lawn bowling and spent time reading to children in attendance at the event .

[ARG0: Melania Trump] has [ARGM-MNR: successfully] [V: planned] [ARG1: yet another White House Easter Egg Roll] . This year she incorporated lawn bowling and spent time reading to children in attendance at the event .
